fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: - Attack someone at night. One use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can use your ability up to as many uses as you have left.
- Gain a use of your ability at the beginning of the night.
- Gain a use of your ability for each vote you received during the day. This also applies if a vote is retracted. If someone votes for you, retracts their vote, then votes for you again, it counts twice.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value:
https://discord.com/channels/970041597590929519/970051770342588467/1019361724572389387
> Eliminate absolutely everyone, including Neutrals who would otherwise assist you.
